items.sentence: Tom was satisfied with how things turned out.
Tom watched Mary disappear around the corner.
Tom grabbed his rifle and pointed it at Mary.
Tom grudgingly did what Mary asked him to do.
Tom had a heart attack and died in his sleep.
I want to thank you for what you did for Tom.
Tom wasn\'t persuaded by Mary\'s explanation.
We don\'t even know who\'s going to be there.
I thought Tom was going to help Mary do that.
I thought the bus was free, but I had to pay.
The telephone rang while I was having supper.
The tickets for the concert are on sale here.
The typhoon did a lot of damage to the crops.
I gave Tom a direct order, but he ignored it.
We were never allowed to celebrate Christmas.
This problem doesn\'t have a simple solution.
I should\'ve written down everybody\'s names.
Is it true that Tom won\'t come to our party?
How can a skinny person like you eat so much?
How can anyone think that Tom is a good boss?
